New Records: Roston Chase scored an unbeaten 42 off 27 balls to take the West Indies team to victory
Key Match Events: Roston Chase's unbeaten 42 off 27 balls stole the spotlight from Andre Russell
Brandon King (34) and Nicholas Pooran (27) made significant contributions for West Indies
Sese Bau's belligerent 50 off 43 balls represented the only meaningful contribution from PNG
Pre-Game Insights: There are no pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Roston Chase reflected on his performance, saying he gave himself time to get in and back his skills to get the ball away
Assad Vala reflected on the narrow loss, saying they were 10-15 runs short of a more competitive target
Rovman Powell said the team needs to be better in all three departments of the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Guyana National Stadium in Providence, Guyana
The West Indies team stuttered and stumbled before eventually scrambling a five-wicket win with an over to spare
This was Papua New Guinea's second appearance in a world tournament, having lost all three matches in their debut appearance at the 2021 T20 World Cup
